pages.text: I hope you aren't arachnophobic, as the $(thing)Misty World$() is home to a few varieties of Hostile Giant $(thing)Spiders$(). $(thing)Cave Spiders$(), smaller cousin to the $(thing)Spider$(), are much the same, though their bite is $(thing)Poisonous$().
